node.doctext:
A band of noders dedicated to setting the standards for biographies on E2, both through their writing, and their [blab!|constructive criticism] of others' work.

Suggested reading for all might begin with [E2 FAQ: writing a biography].

The [The Biog List|Biog List] exists for the purpose of keeping track of things. Questions and requests to shimmer, please.

[{linkGroupMessages}]
node.title: e2biography
